abstract: Christopher Whalen of Tangent Capital Partners says the strongest banks are the ones without exposure to Wall Street, and he is setting up a fund focused on small and midsize banks.
snippet: Christopher Whalen of Tangent Capital Partners says the strongest banks are the ones without exposure to Wall Street, and he is setting up a fund focused on small and midsize banks.
lead_paragraph: R. Christopher Whalen doesn’t mince words about the big banks.

headline.main: New Fund Hopes to Prove Outspoken Analyst’s Thesis
